CustomField.description: Three descriptions are given in micro finance excel sheet. Operational Self Sufficiency ratio (Operating revenue /Financial expense + Loan-loss provision expense + Operating expense) of greater than 90% as per the last financial statements. Risk Coverage Ratio must be more than 75% at all times (Risk Coverage Ratio is defined as Impairment Loss Allowance/PAR 30 + Restructured loan portfolio). Capital Adequacy ratio (Total Regulatory Capital/Total Assets) at no less than 10%.
